meta.name: Auto-Send Zillow Real Estate Listings to Telegram using ScrapeGraphAI

parameters.userPrompt: Extract real estate listings from this site. Use the following schema for response { "address": "123 Main St, Columbus, OH 43215", "price": "$450,000", "beds": "3", "baths": "2", "sqft": "1,850", "lot_size": "0.25 acres", "year_built": "1995", "property_type": "Single Family", "listing_url": "https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/123-Main-St..." }

parameters.content:
# Step 2: ScrapeGraphAI Node ü§ñ

This is the core node which will scrape the website that you want.

## How to Use
- Simply mention the website URL
- Describe what you want to extract in natural language

## Example
- **Website**: `https://www.example.com`
- **Instruction**: "Extract all article titles and URLs from this news site"

# Step 3: Format the response üß±

This node will format the results for sheets.

## What it does
- Prepares data for Telegram compatibility
- Each listing is formatted in beautiful message
- Maintains all important metadata
- Easy to filter and analyze data

# Step 1: Trigger ‚è±Ô∏è

This trigger will invoke the workflow on the mentioned time.

## Configuration Options
- You can mention your custom time for trigger
- Or even choose a different trigger

# Step 4:Telegram Node üìß
This node will send the listings to your given channel or chat

## What it does
- Connects to your Telegram account
- Sends the message using the created bot 


## Configuration
- Create a bot using @botfather in Telegram
- Add the given api key in config
- Add your chat/channel username in config
